trans-unit.source: Provides properties and methods for constructing an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 提供属性和方法，用于构造电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建议的替代项︰ <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Mail.MailMessage"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Mail.MailMessage"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建议的替代项︰ <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the collection of attachments that are transmitted with the message.
trans-unit.target: 指定与消息的传输的附件集合。

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建议的替代项︰ <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: New attachments can be added to the mail message by a call to `Message.Attachments.Add(MyMailMessage)`.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用，可以将新附件添加到邮件消息`Message.Attachments.Add(MyMailMessage)`。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail.Send%2A> for an example of <xref:System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail> usage.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail.Send%2A>有关的示例<xref:System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail>使用情况。</xref:System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail> </xref:System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> collection of <xref href="System.Web.Mail.MailAttachment"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IList>集合<xref href="System.Web.Mail.MailAttachment"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a semicolon-delimited list of email addresses that receive a blind carbon copy (BCC) of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置以分号分隔的电子邮件地址接收电子邮件的密件抄送 (BCC) 列表。

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建议的替代项︰ <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Recipients in the semicolon-delimited list can be either email addresses or address book display names.
trans-unit.target: 以分号分隔列表中的收件人可以是电子邮件地址或地址簿显示名称。

trans-unit.source: The primary and carbon copy (<xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage.Cc%2A>) recipients do not see the addresses in the `Bcc` field.
trans-unit.target: 在主服务器和抄送 (<xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage.Cc%2A>) 收件人看不到中的地址`Bcc`字段。</xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage.Cc%2A>

trans-unit.source: A semicolon-delimited list of e-mail addresses that receive a blind carbon copy (BCC) of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 以分号分隔电子邮件地址接收电子邮件的密件抄送 (BCC) 的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the body of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置电子邮件消息的正文。

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建议的替代项︰ <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The body of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 电子邮件消息的正文。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the encoding type of the body of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的电子邮件消息的正文的编码类型。

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建议的替代项︰ <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Text.Encoding> values that indicates the encoding type of the body of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref:System.Text.Encoding>值，该值指示编码类型的电子邮件消息的正文。</xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content type of the body of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置电子邮件消息的正文的内容类型。

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建议的替代项︰ <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.Mail.MailFormat"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.Mail.MailFormat"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a semicolon-delimited list of e-mail addresses that receive a carbon copy (CC) of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置接收电子邮件的抄送 (件 CC) 的电子邮件地址的以分号分隔的列表。

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建议的替代项︰ <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Recipients in the semicolon-delimited list can be either email addresses or address book display names.
trans-unit.target: 以分号分隔列表中的收件人可以是电子邮件地址或地址簿显示名称。

trans-unit.source: A semicolon-delimited list of e-mail addresses that receive a carbon copy (CC) of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 以分号分隔电子邮件地址接收电子邮件的抄送 (CC) 的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of objects that map to Microsoft Collaboration Data Objects (CDO) fields.
trans-unit.target: 获取映射到 Microsoft 协作数据对象 (CDO) 字段的对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建议的替代项︰ <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Fields property is used to set extended properties for Collaboration Data Objects (CDO).
trans-unit.target: 字段属性用于设置协作数据对象 (CDO) 的扩展的属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about CDO, see "Collaboration Data Objects" and "Configuration CoClass" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 有关 CDO 的详细信息，请参阅"协作数据对象"和"配置组件类"http://msdn.microsoft.com/library 上 MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection of objects that map to Collaboration Data Objects (CDO) fields.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>映射到协作数据对象 (CDO) 字段的对象的集合。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the e-mail address of the sender.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置发件人的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建议的替代项︰ <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The sender's e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: 发件人的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the custom headers that are transmitted with the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 使用电子邮件中指定所传输的自定义标头。

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建议的替代项︰ <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection of custom headers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>自定义标头的集合。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the priority of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的电子邮件的优先级。

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建议的替代项︰ <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.Mail.MailPriority"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.Mail.MailPriority"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the subject line of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置电子邮件的主题行。

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建议的替代项︰ <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The subject line of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 电子邮件主题行。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a semicolon-delimited list of recipient e-mail addresses.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置收件人的电子邮件地址的以分号分隔的列表。

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建议的替代项︰ <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Recipients in the semicolon-delimited list can be either email addresses or address book display names.
trans-unit.target: 以分号分隔列表中的收件人可以是电子邮件地址或地址簿显示名称。

trans-unit.source: A semicolon-delimited list of e-mail addresses.
trans-unit.target: 以分号分隔的电子邮件地址列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Base" name="Content-Base" href=""></xref> HTTP header, the URL base of all relative URLs used within the HTML-encoded body of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Base" name="Content-Base" href=""> </xref> HTTP 标头，所有使用 HTML 编码主体电子邮件中的相对 Url 的 URL 基数。

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建议的替代项︰ <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The URL base.
trans-unit.target: URL 基。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Location" name="Content-Location" href=""></xref> HTTP header for the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Location" name="Content-Location" href=""></xref>电子邮件消息的 HTTP 标头。

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建议的替代项︰ <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_content-base" name="content-base" href=""></xref> header.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_content-base" name="content-base" href=""> </xref>标头。
